column2: once I pulled out a slice..I noticed that there was TONS of cheese just oozing out of it.  Normally
column3: this would be very exciting to me since I'm  a little obsessed with cheese.  BUT
column4: there was just WAY too much cheese in here.  It was like bread and melted cheese.  It was too much.  We actually couldn't even finish one small pizza.  I was totally bummed.
